casebody.data:
Menahem ROTH and Ester Roth, Appellant,
v.
SYNOVUS BANK; Sterns Bank, N.A.; Jane/John Doe n/k/a Segal Roth; All Unknown Parties Claiming Interests by, Through, Under or Against a Named Defendant to this Action, or Having or Claiming to Have Any Right, Title, or Interest in the Property Herein Described, Appellees. Case No. 2D15-4044 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed August 25, 2017

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
